nodes.label: Draw reversible and irreversible changes (ice melting vs. egg cooking)
Ice turning into water and back to ice
Whole egg to cracked egg to scrambled egg
Correct understanding: Reversible change depicted with labels 'melting' and 'freezing'
Incomplete understanding: Missing label for egg cooking to scrambled egg
Suggestion: Add label 'cooking' to arrow pointing from cracked egg to scrambled egg
